abstract: Morgan Stanley is a safe and solid investment bank by almost any measure, but diminished trust in the financial system has sent its shares down 42 percent this year.
snippet: Morgan Stanley is a safe and solid investment bank by almost any measure, but diminished trust in the financial system has sent its shares down 42 percent this year.

headline.main: Between the Lines, Wall St. Banks Face a Deficit of Trust
headline.print_headline: For Banks, A Deficit Of Trust
